name: IISMedia Smooth and Adobe ReTransporter
short_description:
This is a simple and small system to republic some Smooth Streaming Form IIS7,The Microsoft's IIS Media Pack have some more support for SliverLight,But sometimes we found it is very different to republish some PublishPointer like in WMS.This Program Can remake something.But it is just start.It is very poor.I will update it.
       There is Another System with A Special JWPlayer and a SplitProgram to Split A httpstreaming FLV file into some block.then you can use the specialJWPlayer to playback them as a live.the provider is "winney".(*^__^*) 
      I am studing some more.
      It is welcome to have some discuss.
